nodes.text: Korvaii was a small agriworld located in the Mid Rim's Kordu sector.

During the 900s BBY, the Galactic Republic's Judicial Forces fought a battle on the surface of Korvaii at the conclusion of the Melusi Uprising. Following the formation of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY, Korvaii was initially left relatively unharmed by the new regime and was represented in the Imperial Senate by the Human Mina Dhori. However, after the Senate was abrogated by Emperor Palpatine in 0 BBY, the Imperial Military imprisoned the planet's population in camps.
